title: Geyser melodies
creator_credit: Guy Haselton and Guy O Hasleton Productions
brief_description: The world’s greatest display of geysers and hot springs in Yellowstone National Park in North America. Shown as being closely akin to nature’s most awesome spectacle - volcanoes. Designed to promote a better understanding of the earth’s beginnings and to show the artistry of nature in one of its most spectacular forms.
